relevant_findings.physical_examination: Unremarkable except for significantly high BP and mild left ventricular hypertrophy (LVH) detected at echocardiography.
relevant_findings.biochemical_profile: Hypokalemia (2.6 mmol/L), low renin (5.4 pg/mL), and undetectable aldosterone values.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: After treatment, blood pressure normalized, normal serum potassium concentrations, regular growth rate, and partial regression of LVH at echocardiography.

relevant_findings.physical_examination: Normal except for BP values of 150/110 mm Hg.
relevant_findings.biochemical_profile: Hypokalemia, low renin, undetectable aldosterone serum concentrations, and THFs to THE ratio equal to 6.1.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: After treatment, blood pressure normalized and normal kalemia reported after 1-year follow-up.
